n: Ed's Secret Pea and Mushroom Salad
des: "Ed didn't want me sharing his recipe, but here it is! You won't believe how simple it is - and its delicious!"
ins: In a serving bowl, stir together the drained peas and mushrooms. Season to taste with hot pepper sauce.
